subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: A fifth-place finish Sunday at Bristol has helped Paul Menard, of Richard Childress Racing, show that talent, and not simply money, has earned him a spot at Nascar’s elite level.
snippet: A fifth-place finish Sunday at Bristol has helped Paul Menard, of Richard Childress Racing, show that talent, and not simply money, has earned him a spot at Nascar’s elite level.
